titleInfo.title: Data Publication: Charm and beauty in the deconfined plasma from quenched lattice QCD

mods.abstract: Data publication for "Charm and beauty in the deconfined plasma from quenched lattice QCD", arXiv:2108.13693. Contains plot scripts and data shown in figures.

Bielefeld University.
